title: Sliver
description: AN UPTOWN HIGH-RISEA glittering Manhattan "sliver" building.A successful single career woman.A shocking secret hidden in brick and concrete.A HIGH-TECH NIGHTMARESomeone is watching her.He watches her unpack, watches her make the bed; his eyes are everywhere.He owns the building: now he owns her.SLIVERThere's no place more frightening than home.
author: Ira Levin
